targets.query:
from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs_pool" or r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "pool", "dataset"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "_field", "_value", "pool", "dataset"])
  |> limit(n: 100)

panels.title: ZFS Fields Available (Debug - Check both 'zfs' and 'zfs_pool' measurements)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /zfs/)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> distinct(column: "_measurement")
  |> keep(columns: ["_measurement"])

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] != "tmpfs" and r["device"] != "devtmpfs")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["path"])

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] !~ /^(lo|docker|veth|br-).*$/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] !~ /^(loop|dm-).*$/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_usage" or r["_field"] == "memory_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["process_name"] != "")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time", "process_name"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with process_name: r.process_name, "CPU %": r.cpu_usage, "Memory %": r.memory_usage }))
  |> keep(columns: ["process_name", "CPU %", "Memory %"])
  |> sort(columns: ["CPU %"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensors" or r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp" or r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "load15")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_users")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs_pool" or r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "health" or r["_field"] == "state" or r["_field"] == "status" or r["_field"] == "health_numeric" or r["_field"] == "pool_health")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 
      if r._value == 0 or r._value == "ONLINE" or r._value == "online" then 0
      else if r._value == 1 or r._value == "DEGRADED" or r._value == "degraded" then 1 
      else if r._value == 2 or r._value == "FAULTED" or r._value == "faulted" then 2
      else if r._value == 3 or r._value == "OFFLINE" or r._value == "offline" then 3
      else if r._value == 4 or r._value == "REMOVED" or r._value == "removed" then 4
      else if r._value == 5 or r._value == "UNAVAIL" or r._value == "unavail" then 5
      else r._value
    }))

panels.title: ZFS Pool Health Status
panels.description: If no data: 1) Check the debug panel below for available fields. 2) Ensure Telegraf has the ZFS input enabled with: [[inputs.zfs]] poolMetrics = true

targets.query:
from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs_pool" or r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "allocated" or r["_field"] == "size" or r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "free")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time", "pool", "dataset"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
      _value: if exists r.allocated and exists r.size then 
                (float(v: r.allocated) / float(v: r.size)) * 100.0
              else if exists r.used and exists r.size then
                (float(v: r.used) / float(v: r.size)) * 100.0
              else if exists r.used and exists r.free then
                (float(v: r.used) / float(v: r.used + r.free)) * 100.0
              else 0.0,
      _field: "usage_percent" 
    }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0.0)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "arcstats_hit_ratio" or r["_field"] == "arcstats_hits_perc" or r["_field"] == "arcstats_misses_perc")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "arcstats_size" or r["_field"] == "arcstats_c" or r["_field"] == "arcstats_c_min" or r["_field"] == "arcstats_c_max")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs_pool" or r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "nread" or r["_field"] == "nwritten" or r["_field"] == "read_bytes" or r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs" or r["_measurement"] == "zfs_dataset")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "available" or r["_field"] == "referenced")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time", "dataset", "path"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
      dataset: if exists r.dataset then r.dataset else r.path, 
      Used: if exists r.used then r.used else 0, 
      Available: if exists r.available then r.available else 0, 
      Total: if exists r.used and exists r.available then r.used + r.available else 0,
      "Usage %": if exists r.used and exists r.available and r.available > 0 then (float(v: r.used) / float(v: r.used + r.available)) * 100.0 else 0.0
    }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Total > 0)
  |> keep(columns: ["dataset", "Used", "Available", "Total", "Usage %"])
  |> sort(columns: ["Usage %"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs_pool" or r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rops" or r["_field"] == "wops" or r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "nixnas")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> distinct(column: "_measurement")
  |> keep(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_measurement"], desc: false)
